channel.title: New D rank mission.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "New D rank mission." - C-Rank! Save an Academy Student!

item.title: New D rank mission.
item.content:encoded:
Taijutsu

C-Rank! Save an Academy Student!
An Academy Student is about to get hit by a wagon! Save them!

Difficulty: 9 Successes: 3

win condition:
You dash and knock them aside at the last moment!

No apparent allies/drops/jutsus. (Or at least none my theme got for my red eyer)
